attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a public holiday in England, and treat it with the respect bit deserves.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make St Georges Day a public holiday in England, and treat it with the respect bit deserves.
It's time England was allowed to celebrate its' history and culture, and through that allow its' people to rediscover it.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
